pages.text:
Events & Group Bookings
Whether you’re planning a private event or a large group dinner, we’ve got options for you. For private parties or dining reservations for 8 or more, check out the contact options below — we’ll help you bring your gathering to life.
Event Inquiry
Large Groups
Event Inquiry
Large Groups
Events
Let us handle the details while you savor every moment of your special occasion.
Elevate your next event at
Orange Blossom
, where sophistication meets South Beach charm. Our enchanting venue provides the perfect backdrop for memorable occasions. Choose from a host of pre-packed drinking and dining packages tailored to your preferences, taking the stress out of planning your next event or celebration. Ensure a seamless blend of gourmet cuisine and exceptional service, allowing you to focus on creating unforgettable moments.
Whether it’s an intimate gathering or a grand celebration, our versatile space, adorned with a rustic-chic atmosphere and enchanting courtyard seating, sets the stage for an extraordinary experience. Immerse your guests in the fusion of flavors and entertainment that defines Orange Blossom.
To begin planning your next event or celebration stress-free, simply fill out our Event Request Form below.
Private Event Software powered by Tripleseat
Large Group Reservation
A Large Group is considered any party of 8 guests or more. If your group is smaller than 8, we kindly ask that you book through our OpenTable app for the most seamless experience.
*Please note: This form is for large group dining only. For private events or venue buyouts, kindly use our dedicated Private Events Form. We look forward to hosting you!
